8854.name: Total Fertility Rate (Gapminder until 1949; UN Population Division for 1950 to 2015)
8854.datasetName: Total Fertility Rate â€“ Gapminder until 1950 then updated UN figures (2015)
8854.s_name: Gapminder for estimates until 1949; UN Population Division for 1950 to 2015

source.name: Gapminder for estimates until 1949; UN Population Division for 1950 to 2015
source.dataPublishedBy: We have combined two data sources: Gapminder's dataset for fertility rates until 1949; and the UN Population Division for data between 1950 to 2015
source.additionalInfo:
Up to 1949 the data published in Version 6 of the Gapminder dataset was used. All information can be found at the source: https://www.gapminder.org/news/children-per-women-since-1800-in-gapminder-world/ 

Data from 1950 onwards was obtained from the interpolated series published in the UN World Population Prospects 2017 which is available online here: https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/Download/Standard/Interpolated/
